sailpoint.object

Enum Duration.Scale

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Duration.Scale>
      • sailpoint.object.Duration.Scale
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Duration.Scale>, sailpoint.tools.MessageKeyHolder
    Enclosing class:
    Duration

    public static enum Duration.Scale
extends java.lang.Enum<Duration.Scale>
implements sailpoint.tools.MessageKeyHolder
    Enumeration of the scales of a duration. Note that there is a subset of this enum in CertificationScheduleCommonModule.DURATION_SCALE. If you update this enum, you may need to update that constant as well.
